title: "Why the Next Generation of Robots May Be Based on Ants and Fish"
excerpt: "In the future, the most useful robots will work together as hives. That's according to Radhika Nagpal, co-founder of Root Robotics and professor of computer science at Harvard University. Nagpal spoke at the Conference on Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS) recently about the ways engineers are drawing from nature to create the next generation of robots."
